summary: Adds a skill book for speech based on a post in the Bethesda lore forums
descriptionHtml:
This mod simply adds a skill book based on a rether nice piece on fannon I read on the Bethesda Lore forums (link: http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1429983-the-march-of-the-doom-drum/)

I know it\'s not something complex but it\'s the first mod I upload so try not to talk too much crap about it in the comments (if someone comments that is -.-)

Anyway, the name of the book is \"March of the Doom Drum\" and is a speech skill book.

Credits:
-Bethesda for making Skyrim and this world we all love so much
-Jara of the Black Wind from the Beth forums for giving me permission to make this mod and creating this piece of lore I liked so much
author: Sambonizer
